title: Ground News - Group of Palestinian-Americans skip Blinken meeting over Biden admin’s support for Israel’s offensive in Gaza
text: Group of Palestinian-Americans skip Blinken meeting over Biden admin’s support for Israel’s offensive in Gaza A number of Palestinian-Americans refused to attend a roundtable meeting with US Secretary of State Summary by Ground News [Antony Blinken](https://ground.news/interest/antony-blinken)on Thursday. The meeting comes amid continued outrage from many progressive Democrats, Muslim and younger voters about the administration's handling of Gaza. Six people did attend the meeting, a source familiar told CNN, and those who attended felt conflicted about doing so. 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] CNN Group of Palestinian-Americans skip Blinken meeting over Biden admin’s support for Israel’s offensive in Gaza A number of Palestinian-Americans refused to attend a roundtable meeting with Secretary of State Antony Blinken on Thursday to discuss the situation in Gaza in protest at the Biden administration’s ongoing support for Israel’s offensive in the war-torn strip – a military campaign that has exacted a massive humanitarian toll. 42 minutes ago·Atlanta, United StatesRead Full Article Think freely.Subscribe and get full access to Ground NewsSubscriptions start at $9.99/year [Subscribe](/subscribe) Coverage Details Total News Sources0Leaning Left1Leaning Right0Center0Last Updated31 minutes agoBias Distribution 100% Left Bias Distribution - 100% of the sources lean Left 100% Left L 100% Factuality To view factuality data please Upgrade to Premium Ownership To view ownership data please Upgrade to Vantage Sources are mostly out of (0)
